summary: CalcAuto AiPro - Rabais concessionnaire field relocation tests. All tests PASSED. The 'Rabais concess.' input field has been successfully moved from the Location SCI section to the main calculator section (directly below 'Prix du véhicule'). The field correctly affects both financing options (Option 1 and Option 2) by reducing the Capital financé and monthly payments.

integration_issues.issue: The data-testid='rabais-concess-input' attribute is present in the code (index.tsx line 2270) but Playwright couldn't find it. The input was located by position instead.

critical_code_review_comments: VERIFIED: 'Rabais concess.' input moved to main section (index.tsx line 2258-2273) - directly below 'Prix du véhicule'
VERIFIED: 'Rabais concess.' is NOT in Location SCI section anymore - Location SCI only shows PDSF/PDOC, Solde reporté, km options
VERIFIED: useCalculator hook applies rabaisConcess to both Option 1 and Option 2 financing calculations (useCalculator.ts lines 115, 134)
VERIFIED: Entering $5000 rabais reduced Option 1 monthly from $1,211.66 to $1,119.10 (-$92.56/month)
VERIFIED: Entering $5000 rabais reduced Option 2 monthly from $1,219.94 to $1,135.17 (-$84.77/month)
VERIFIED: 'Meilleur Choix' banner displays correctly with updated savings calculation
context_for_next_testing_agent: Rabais concessionnaire feature verified. The field is now shared between financing (Option 1 & 2) and Location SCI calculations. The leaseRabaisConcess state variable is passed to both useCalculator hook (line 457) and used directly in lease calculations (line 698). Location SCI section now only shows: PDSF/PDOC, Solde reporté, Kilométrage/an, and Terme location fields.

rabais_field_position.description: 'Rabais concess.' appears directly below 'Prix du véhicule' in main calculator section (y:1271 vs y:1184 for Prix)

rabais_not_in_location_sci.description: Location SCI section only shows: PDSF/PDOC, Solde reporté, Kilométrage/an, Terme location - NO 'Rabais concess.' field

rabais_affects_financing.description: $5000 rabais reduced Option 1 monthly from $1,211.66 to $1,119.10 and Option 2 from $1,219.94 to $1,135.17

meilleur_choix_banner.description: 'Option 1 = Meilleur choix! Économies: XXX $' banner displays correctly with dynamic savings calculation
